`He went up to where there is a big cave.' (Frank 1990: 40)
b. [a÷ktti awn÷ kawa nuk-z]-ek¥ TM itsor-e÷-ri
`He went up to where there is a big cave.' (Frank 1990: 40)
He went up to where there is a big cave.
They came (but I didn't see it).
